body.name: Broom and Dustpan Set-Heavy-Duty Broom and Dust Pan with 52-inch Adjustable Long Handle – Upright Dust Pan and Broom Set with Lock and Built-in Scraper – Sweeper Broom for Home, Commercial, Office-

features: 1.A Must for a Clean Home: Sweeping and cleaning any space will be much easier and more fun with this heavy-duty broom and dust pan set! Our broom with dustpan is easier and more comfortable to use than traditional sets and ensures efficient cleaning with little effort! 2.Complete Broom and Dust Pan Set: The broom and dustpan set for home makes the most amazing team to tackle dust, dirt, grime and or residues, featuring long handles and an ingenious design that leaves your floors clean without hurting your back!

3.No More Bending with Our Telescopic Pole: The broom dustpan set is designed with a 52-inch telescopic pole handle that’s also adjustable, allowing you to set the height to your liking! With this long handle, you won’t have to bend anymore and focus on precise and easy cleaning. 4.Wide Opening and Built-In Scraper: Our long handle dust pan features a large collector capacity and a wide opening, that makes sweeping so much easier and less messy. The dust pan also has a built-in scraper, specially designed to clean the bristles of your broom and keep it tidy.

5.Space-Saving and Versatile: The broom dustpan is equipped with a practical lock mechanism that holds the broom upright to save up space and ensure quick access. Our standing dustpan with broom meets all your sweeping tasks, both indoor and outdoor, at home, office, work, garage, courtyard, sidewalks, commercial spaces and more.
body.description: Our mission is to transform your space into a clean and comfortable environment by providing a wide selection of cleaning supplies, accessories and solutions that promise to exceed your expectations! We are working with superior quality materials and modern designs to offer amazing products that perfectly combine functionality, practicality and aesthetics to make your everyday life easier and your living space cleaner! If you encounter any problems with your order, there is no need to worry because we are always at your service to address any issues or concerns. Dust Pan and Broom Set – The Staple of a Clean Household Our broom and dustpan set is a must-have for effortless cleaning, without bending or investing too much effort! What makes this dust pan and broom truly amazing is the 52-inch telescopic pole handle that can be adjusted to meet your needs and ensures comfortable sweeping without bending or hurting your back! The sweeper dust pan has a large collector room and a large opening that can effectively collect all the dust, dirt and grime and keep it inside while the built-in scraper allows you to clean your broom much faster and easier! Made with superior quality materials, our dust pan and broom will last for years to come to meet your cleaning needs! Still not convinced? Here are some of the amazing features of our broom and dust pan set: 1. Dust pan and broom set; 2. 52-inch telescopic pole handle
